2015 ASPB Project Proposals

Database of 2015 research project proposals for Arkansas soybean checkoff funding

2015-ASPB-Proposals is maintained by Dawn Brendle Jackson on a personal Github page. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

Thanks to the Open Source work of Jonathan Soma, Chris Essig & Chris Keller for the use of tabletop.js to pull json from public Google Spreadsheet and feed it to the DataTables jQuery plugin.
